Odoo_Score

Odoo supercore

odoo_score is a library that extends the odoo orm functionality and makes available a simple odoo shell even for older Odoo version.

Regression tests of this package do not guarantee full features coverage. In order to complete all tests, it required to run test of the Odoo module test_odoo_score-* in repository zerobug_test Digest of odoo_shell ====================

odoo_shell

Odoo shell is a simple line command shell to manager Odoo database using the internal Odoo functions.
